code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic c,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

    always @(*) begin
        q = (b & d) | (c & (a | b));
    end

endmodule
[DONE]

iterations.code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic c,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

    always @(*) begin
        q = 1'b0;
        if ((b & d) | (c & (a | b))) begin
            q = 1'b1;
        end
    end

endmodule
[DONE]

[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic a,
    input logic b,
    input logic c,
    input logic d,
    output logic q
);

    always @(*) begin
        q = (b & d) | (c & (a | b));
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
